Item.Name: Backstretch Pool Bar
Item.Content:
Backstretch Pool Bar in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Backstretch Pool Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/214152.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Round the home stretch with a refreshing non-alcoholic drink in hand, or choose from a winning selection of beers and cocktails. Make your victory lap even sweeter with a selection of poolside snacks, including hot pretzels and sandwiches.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Chip 'n' Dale's Café
Item.Content:
Chips & Slices in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Chips & Slices

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18394590.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Help your game stay above par with a refueling stop at this convenient snack stand at Disney's Lake Buena Vista Golf Course. Choose from a variety of deli-style sandwiches, snacks and refreshing beverages—combos available.

Item.Name: On the Rocks Pool Bar
Item.Content:
On the Rocks in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for On the Rocks

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002008.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Sip on spring water or more robust refreshments like Saratoga Lager at this poolside gazebo bar with a view of the High Rock Spring pool. Specialty cocktails frozen or “on the rocks,” draft beer, sangria and wine are also available.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: In-Room Dining - Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa
Item.Content:
Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18482691.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Put your hunger to rest—order oven-fresh pizza, even after the sun’s gone to bed! Kick things off with one of our scrumptious starters, sink your teeth into a slice, wash it down with a glass of beer or wine and then seal the deal with some dessert.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: The Artist's Palette
Item.Content:
The Artist's Palette in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Artist's Palette

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002219.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Paint a pleasing culinary picture with gourmet sandwiches, salads, soup, flatbreads and grab ’n’ go items. Hot breakfast is served until 11:00 AM. After 5:00 PM, enjoy chef’s dinner specials like rotisserie chicken or stuffed meatloaf.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: The Paddock Grill
Item.Content:
The Paddock Grill in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Paddock Grill

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16018746.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Graze on sandwiches with gourmet flair, from spice-crusted fish to roasted vegetable. Chopped chicken salad, bacon cheeseburgers and house-made potato chips—invented in Saratoga—are also featured. Breakfast is served until 11:00 AM.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: The Turf Club Bar and Grill
Item.Content:
The Turf Club Bar and Grill in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Turf Club Bar and Grill

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/98575.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Savor classic American cuisine in a racetrack clubhouse setting with gorgeous golf course and lake views.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: The Turf Club Lounge
Item.Content:
The Turf Club Lounge in Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Disney's Saratoga Springs Resort & Spa, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Turf Club Lounge

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002266.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Linger on the sweeping views of Disney’s Lake Buena Vista Golf Course and Downtown Disney West Side at this casual bar inside The Turf Club Bar and Grill. Serving a light menu, and featuring a pool table, it’s the perfect place to unwind.
  Cuisine: American
